content.en: Automated fruit inspection: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms to automate the inspection of fruit quality, accurately identify different types of fruits, and improve the classification of fruits based on freshness. They are developing deep learning-based frameworks and utilizing techniques like convolutional neural networks and transfer learning to achieve these goals. These advancements in machine vision and deep learning have the potential to revolutionize fruit detection, waste control, and prediction of fruit quality in agriculture.
content.da: Automatiseret frugteftersyn: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer til at automatisere inspektionen af frugtkvalitet, præcist identificere forskellige typer af frugt og forbedre klassifikationen af frugter baseret på friskhed. De udvikler dybdelæringsbaserede rammer og anvender teknikker som konvolutionelle neurale netværk og transfer learning for at opnå disse mål. Disse fremskridt inden for maskinvision og dybdelæring har potentiale til at revolutionere frugtdetektion, affaldskontrol og forudsigelse af frugtkvalitet i landbruget.
